Hetvi Thakker

Account Manager Intern

Will Bagnall

Founder & CEO

will@susodigital.com

Will is SUSO’s founder and CEO. He started the company in 2014 as a two-person consultancy business and has transformed it into a team of forty specialists providing technical SEO services for clients in a wide range of industries. Will received his bachelor’s degree in Law from the University of Bristol and went on to work as the Head of Business Development for Custard Factory. There, he was a mentor to a number of organisations and expanded his knowledge of business development strategies and infrastructure development.

While building SUSO, he has gained experience scaling a team of SEO experts and developed an international team based in Poland. Will values a people-first culture, which allows every one of SUSO’s employees to strive for the best in a safe, stimulating, and supportive environment.

Apart from being involved with SUSO, Will is also a trustee and co-founder of an Arts and Music Community incubator project in London called HQI.

Andrew Oleksik

Managing Director

andrew@susodigital.com

Andrew joined the company in 2022 as Managing Director, and he is in charge of overseeing the company’s overall performance while directing all teams.

Andrew has 10+ years of hands-on SEO expertise guiding businesses with a global presence in the development and execution of expert SEO tactics. He’s created a strong international SEO team from scratch, as well as an extensive product portfolio, and he’s delivered several successful worldwide campaigns for global brands. Andrew aims to deliver only outstanding campaign performance by taking an open-minded and goal-oriented approach to each campaign and project.

Andrew graduated from the Wroclaw University of Technology with a Master’s degree in Computer Science and is an avid science and technology enthusiast. It’s this love for technology and his web development expertise that allows him to recognize and utilize opportunities for optimizations that others might not typically recognize. 

The values he highly regards from people include sincerity, personal effort, and commitment. He also loves horse racing, Italian coffee, and a challenging game of chess.

Dan Fallon

Board Advisor

dan.fallon@susodigital.com

Dan is SUSO’s Board Advisor, helping the CEO make the best decisions about the direction in which the company should go. He’s been in the marketing scene for decades now, and has successfully grown two agencies into award-winning and successful businesses. Privately, Dan is a huge sports enthusiast – he cycled across Europe and enjoys CrossFit, sailing, and skiing.

Barbara Demeter

Head of Client Services

barbara.demeter@susodigital.com

Barbara joined the company in 2023, bringing to her role of Head of Client Services an abundance of experience and skill. Prior to joining SUSO, she was acting as Client Service Director and as Business Development Lead at a performance marketing agency – two positions that offered Barbara a chance to hone her skills in project management, client services, and team leadership.

With a client services and sales background, her primary focus is to always prioritise Clients’ challenges and opportunities, approaching every project thoroughly prepared and with a collaborative mindset.

She has years of experience working in the industry and a BA in Business Administration from Corvinus University in Budapest as well as from Avans University of Applied Sciences/Breda in the Netherlands.

Barbara is based in Budapest, she’s a mother of two children and an avid skier. Her daily yoga practice keeps her centred and ready for any challenge.

Paulina Krakowiak

Head Of Operations & Delivery

paulina.krakowiak@susodigital.com

At SUSO, Paulina manages a team of Account Managers. She has a background in marketing, PR and sales – she’s been working in the digital marketing field for over a decade now. At work, she utilises the 3.0 management, and she also likes to use tools that correspond to the ever-changing world, which is why she, for example, introduced the SCRUM methodology in her team. Her academic background consists of a Bachelor’s degree in International Relations with specialisation in Public Relations, Master’s degree in Interactive Media and Performance and a Postgraduate in Project Management. In her free time, she enjoys cycling, swimming, reading, nordic walking and travelling (especially to the south), among other things.

Filip Ruprich

Head of SEO

filip.ruprich@susodigital.com

As our new Head of SEO, Filip brings with him a wealth of experience and passion for SEO, leading a team of experts and finding effective solutions that bring value to our Clients and improve the work of our team. With ten years of experience in the SEO industry, working in one of Poland’s largest SEO agencies, where he was able to progress from a Junior role to an R&D Director, Filip gained invaluable experience and expertise that makes him the perfect man for the job.

Filip graduated from the Polish-Japanese Academy of Information Technology, where he studied Business Application Programming. He values pragmatism and prioritising the business value we can offer the Clients. In SUSO, he is responsible for leading the SEO Team, the development of processes and services, and automation of various processes.

Privately, Filip is a big fan of the Premier League, playing football himself. He also loves rock music in all its forms.

Agata Pona

Head of Content

agata.pona@susodigital.com

Agata has been part of the industry for a few years now, and, as she says, she “couldn’t ask for more creative work when it comes to solving problems, getting information across and researching the content needs of many different industries and their clients (not to mention Google algorithms).”

In her free time, she enjoys reading and travelling. She’s a big cat person, as well as a harvest enthusiast, growing her own chilli peppers and catnip in her garden. 

Estelle Slabbert

Link Acquisition Team Leader

estelle.slabbert@susodigital.com

Estelle is an experienced long-form and technical content writer with a strong background in Digital Marketing, PR, eCommerce, and Global SEO campaigns across a variety of niches. At SUSO, she’s responsible for content for our clients’ outreach campaigns. Before joining the world of all things digital, she was involved in brick-and-mortar retail management for 11 years for international brands with a strong focus on HR and new project development and execution.

She currently lives in Namibia, Africa, and is enjoying sunny days on the spectacular desert beachfronts. She often volunteers for various Humanitarian Organisations when needed. For relaxation, she enjoys various creative activities like renovating old homes, painting, and cooking fun meals for her family and friends. She recently joined the exciting world of Crossfit Training to stay active.

Rafid Nassir

Head of Business Development

raf@susodigital.com

Rafid has been with SUSO since 2016, and is currently working as Commercial Director. Prior to joining the company, Raf played a leading role in other agencies, and went through half a decade of high level sales. In 2020, Raf started a couple other ventures and businesses, including a jewellery brand. In his free time, Raf trains Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and builds muscle in the gym

Rowan Collins

Senior Digital Strategist

rowan.collins@susodigital.com

Rowan embarked on his SEO journey back in 2016, initially working in-house for a retailer before joining forces with SUSO to contribute to the growth of our brand. He made significant contributions during his tenure with us until 2019 when he transitioned to Publicis, where he worked with enterprise businesses. Throughout his career, Rowan expanded his knowledge and skills, assuming roles such as UX Account Manager and Senior Media Manager, and even earning an award for his team’s exceptional work.

In late 2021, Rowan joined Mzuri Group as the Head of SEO, eventually taking on the additional responsibility of Head of SEO & UX in late 2022. However, his journey led him back to SUSO in 2023, this time as our Senior Digital Strategist, where he shares his invaluable ideas, experience, and vision with our Team.

Rowan’s professional passion lies in business strategy, specifically assisting start-ups and SMEs in scaling their businesses. On a personal level, he is a devoted Christian with keen interests in theology, philosophy, and American football.

Deep Shah

Senior Project Manager

deep@susodigital.com

As Senior Project Manager at SUSO, Deep leads and oversees internal projects and initiatives. He’s a Computer Science graduate from The University of Leicester and has been a part of SUSO’s team since 2017. One of his biggest accomplishments during his time with the company was writing The SUSO Method – a comprehensive textbook full of SEO knowledge. 

 

Deep values challenges that allow him to push himself and learn new things. Apart from work, one of his biggest passions in life is music. Deep runs a curation project called ocean deep, where he shares the music he loves most. In the past, he has also worked for a record label and written for several online music publications.

Julia Lysakowska

Content Team Leader

julia@susodigital.com

Julia is the Content Team Leader at SUSO. Her main responsibilities include running the Content Team, as well as writing and editing. A detail-oriented perfectionist, she goes out of her way to make sure the team has everything that it needs to be truly great. She graduated from Adam Mickiewicz University with a Master’s degree in English Language and Translation, and in her free time, proofreads and edits YA books written in Polish. 

 

She loves Rammstein, American rap, Starbucks coffee and animals (cats and birds being her favourite). Her hobbies include travelling, photography and finding intertextual and linguistic references in memes. 

Klaudia Piatek

Senior HR Specialist

klaudia.piatek@susodigital.com

Klaudia is an HR Specialist at SUSO. She graduated from Adam Mickiewicz University with a Master’s degree in Psychology. She loves cinema (especially Scandinavian cinema), Polish designs from the 70s, and travelling (her life goal is a trip to Peru). She’s a huge Real Madrid fan and spends her free time doing yoga. After she retires, she wants to raise pygmy goats and become a pottery master, which might have something to do with her hometown being known for its production of pottery. 

Ryan Sponheim

Partner Growth Manager

ryan.sponheim@susodigital.com

Ryan is a Partner Growth Manager at SUSO. He’s originally from Southern California, but he moved to Poland in 2017. Prior to joining the company, he ran his own business, thanks to which he gained experience that allowed him to take up this position. He also has two degrees – an Associate’s degree in Business Administration from Norco College and a Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Management from Cal Poly Pomona. 

In terms of work, his interests include all aspects of digital marketing. In his free time, he enjoys travelling (he visited over 30 countries) and photography (mainly travel, weddings, headshots, and candid photography). 

Gracjan Gaducewicz

SEO Manager

gg@susodigital.com

As a proud member of SUSO’s SEO Team, Gracjan works on creating and implementing strategies to help clients achieve amazing results. Gracjan has a degree in Bioinformatics from Poznan University of Technology, but his work experience revolves mainly around SEO. He believes in a holistic approach to running SEO campaigns, and his priorities focus on self-improvement and increasing his competencies.

 

Gracjan is a huge sports enthusiast (he’s a powerlifter), and the rest of his free time is dedicated to programming and developing SEO tools. 

Marcin Gabryel

SEO Manager

marcin.gabryel@susodigital.com

Marcin has five years of experience working as an SEO specialist. As SEO Manager at SUSO, he’s responsible for performing technical audits and running SEO campaigns. He has degrees in IT and Econometrics from University of Economics in Poznan.

Alongside his work at SUSO, Marcin is a co-founder of an e-commerce business. He also feels quite comfortable programming in JS and PHP. He’s always well organised and detail-oriented. In his free time, you will find him working out at the gym, playing squash, swimming or driving motorcycle. He also loves hiking and spending nights under the clouds.

Marcin Walkowiak

SEO Manager

marcin.walkowiak@susodigital.com

Marcin started his journey with SEO in 2017, right after he graduated from Kaliska Academy with an Engineer’s degree in Computer Science. At first, he worked as a programmer, but he quickly realised his passion for SEO when he started working as a frontend developer. Marcin gained valuable work experience going from the position of Junior SEO Specialist to being a Leader of his own team.

Since 2022 he’s a valued member of SUSO team, developing stellar campaigns for our Clients. At work, Marcin values honesty and directness, placing an emphasis on good communication. He’s a huge F1 enthusiast, avid football player, and he likes to dabble in psychology, watching documentaries and Italian cuisine.

Michal Stolpe

Senior SEO Specialist

michal@susodigital.com

Michał has been involved in SEO at SUSO since 2019. As an SEO Specialist, he enjoys creating topic clusters and working with great, informative content that reads nicely. Among the things that he needs to deal with when on the clock, he is most interested in user intent and how to find it.

 

Privately, he’s a big animal lover (especially Shar-Pei dogs) and enjoys sunsets, nature, and going on walks. His interests include traveling, cooking, and sports; mostly basketball and boxing (despite completing a half-marathon in 2022, he’s not the biggest fan of running).

Patryk Krol

Senior SEO Specialist

patryk.krol@susodigital.com

Patryk is one of the SEO Specialists at SUSO. What helps him provide such an exceptional service to our clients is a compulsive need for improvement and optimisation.

 

Privately, Patryk loves Scandinavia and movies starring Tom Cruise. Despite, as he says, having no artistic skills, he also loves to create things.  When he has spare time, he spends it programming his own online game, writing, and learning new languages.

Kacper Lubonski

Senior SEO Specialist

kacper.lubonski@susodigital.com

Kacper is a senior SEO specialist with 5 years of experience in the field. This year, he graduated from a first degree engineering program in computer science with a specialisation in ecommerce, and he is currently pursuing a master’s degree in online marketing.

In his free time, he enjoys attending electronic music events, mixing tracks and creating hardcore sets as a DJ, and spending time with friends while also staying active with activities such as going to the gym, playing tennis, and squash. Kacper is an honest and direct person with a sense of dark humour, and he is interested in understanding the behaviour of people in society. He also has a love for piercings and tattoos.

Abha Anchawale

Senior SEO Specialist

abha.anchawale@susodigital.com

Abha is one of the Senior SEO Specialists at SUSO. She is an MPKV Rahuri graduate, where she gained an Agriculture Bachelor’s Degree. Since finishing her education, she has worked for several websites, gaining experience. As she says, she embraces the values of innovation, integrity and growth. She aims for precision in her work, and she lives by the principle that she can achieve anything she puts her mind to. 

In her free time, she enjoys reconnecting with nature and herself via meditation and gardening. She loves to read classic literature and tries to write her own stories too.

Aniket Sherkar

Senior SEO Specialist

aniket.sherkar@susodigital.com

Aniket is part of the SEO team at SUSO, and his responsibilities mostly include handling individual internal projects. He is pursuing his MBA degree in Marketing Management, and aside from being an SEO expert, is also a writer and an artist. In his free time, he enjoys painting, writing poems, doing yoga, and cycling. 

Hadi Waqar

SEO Analyst

hadi@susodigital.com

Hadi is an SEO Analyst at SUSO and has been a part of the team since early 2019. He is mainly responsible for the early analysis of potential clients’ websites before their onboarding.

 

Hadi graduated from Bahria University with a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering. He is passionate about everything marketing and social media related and has extracurricular interests, including music, gaming, travelling, and going on hikes.

Ewelina Baczek

SEO Specialist

ewelina.baczek@susodigital.com

Ewelina has four years of experience working in different SEO agencies which, combined with her passion for SEO, allows her to deliver the best results to SUSO’s clients. She graduated from Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznan with a degree in the Polish language. She quickly realised her calling was working in SEO.

 

In her work life, Ewelina values strategic planning and good organisation, which give her the tools to be flexible when a project requires it. Outside of work, her favourite things to do are running, riding a bike, reading comic books, and attending music concerts.

Lukasz Trzpil

SEO Specialist

lukasz.trzpil@susodigital.com

Łukasz is part of SUSO’s SEO team. Prior to joining the company, he already had three years of experience in the field. At work, he mostly enjoys dealing with e-commerce SEO. He is currently pursuing his degree in Computer Science and apart from that, loves to play sports including volleyball and handball. Łukasz also enjoys music – he currently plays guitar and is learning to play the piano.

Adrian Kierus

SEO Specialist

adrian.kierus@susodigital.com

Adrian joined our Team as an SEO Specialist, taking on the responsibilities of conducting analysis and creating superb strategies for our Clients in cooperation with other specialists. Adrian’s interest in SEO sprouted during his years at university. He graduated from Gdansk University with a degree in International Economic Relations. After that, he completed an internship at one of the SEO agencies in Poland, gaining more knowledge in designing SEO campaigns, implementing strategies, and finding new solutions to old problems. 

Adrian’s biggest passions are reading fantasy novels, drinking excellent yerba, and immersing himself in the world of gaming and SEO. 

Rafal Woszczak

SEO Specialist

rafal.woszczak@susodigital.com

Rafał joined SUSO in 2022, taking the role of an SEO Specialist. With three years of experience in SEO and half a year of experience in digital marketing, Rafał is a skilled specialist who’s not afraid of any challenges. His main responsibilities in SUSO include running SEO campaigns and finding effective solutions that allow our Clients to achieve new highs.

Rafał’s biggest passions are SEO and digital marketing, building websites, and the blockchain industry. In his free time, he likes to stay busy with games, spirituality, cryptocurrencies, and anime.

Ettienne Botha

Software Development Manager

ettienne.botha@susodigital.com

Ettienne joined the SUSO Team in 2022 an SEO Web Developer and is now part of our R&D team as Software Development Manager. Ettienne has 5 years of experience in software and web development, which allows him to have a great understanding of optimising search engine discovery and rankings.

In his work, he’s driven and always eager to take on a challenge. He loves finding out-of-the-box solutions to problems, and sharing his skills with others.

In his free time, he enjoys Table Top RPGs, such as Dungeons & Dragons, and spending time with his dog. He’s based in Namibia.

Wojciech Smialek

Web Developer

wojciech@susodigital.com

Wojciech is SUSO’s web developer. While his official responsibility is implementing changes on clients’ websites based on SEO audits, he can be described as a polymath, providing his knowledge wherever and whenever it is needed. Working under pressure and finding solutions are situations in which he feels at ease.

 

Outside of SUSO, Wojciech uses his expertise to take part in a multitude of interesting coding projects. He loves spending time in the mountains, no matter the season. His other hobbies include photography and various types of sports activities, like snowboarding or going to the gym.

Dimitar Vitanov

SEO Web Developer

dimitar.vitanov@susodigital.com

Dimitar holds a Bachelor’s degree in Business and Computer Science, which he obtained in Thessaloniki, Greece. At work, he’s dedicated to helping others whenever and wherever he can. He also won’t pass on an opportunity to have a great conversation. 

In his free time, he enjoys playing basketball, reading books, and playing games. He’s also passionate about travelling. 

Natalia Janicka

Outreach Team Leader

natalia.janicka@susodigital.com

Natalia is the Outreach Team Leader at SUSO. She was born in the United States, but has been living in Poland for over a decade now. She studied Chemical Technology, but after starting her career in SEO she decided that it’s not what she wanted to dedicate herself to. Initially, she worked as a copywriter, even taking up the role of a Team Leader for a few years, but later switched to off-site SEO, working in link building and outreach.

As for her free time, she likes to travel and spend time at the gym, exercising and doing pilates. She’s also a dog mum. As she says, she’s very organised (both at and outside of work) and honest.

Malgorzata Ziolko-Urban

Junior SEO Specialist

malgorzata.ziolko.urban@susodigital.com

Gosia joined the SEO team at SUSO, bringing over two years of experience with her. She’s a graduate of Gdańsk University, where she got her degree in psychology with a specialization in marketing and multiculturalism. 

In her free time, she enjoys playing video games, watching anime, listening to rock music, and creating digital art. She’s very interested in the Far East, especially in Japanese culture. She wants to return to Japan one day. 

Fahad Ahmad

Off-site SEO Specialist

fahad.ahmad@susodigital.com

Fahad joined SUSO in 2023, expanding and supporting our Link Building Team. He’s a skilled specialist with vast experience in SEO, web development, and crafting PPC campaigns. Fahad completed an A Level Computer Science Course and received a Microsoft Certified Solutions Expert certificate as well as a Cisco Certified Network Associate certificate. Currently, he’s studying BTEC in computing at Pearson University London.

 

At SUSO, Fahad is responsible for developing a comprehensive outreach strategy to obtain backlinks from high-ranking websites, identifying backlink opportunities, and working with the Content Team to create engaging and link-worthy content by utilising different methods, among other tasks. 

 

Fahad enjoys travelling, exploring nature, and learning about new things.

Shakhawat Masum

Link Building Specialist

shakhawat.masum@susodigital.com

Masum started his SEO career as a Link Building intern, and after finishing, he pursued his interest in SEO by gaining over three years of experience as an Off-Site SEO Specialist. He is a graduate of Poznań University of Economics and Business, where he pursued a degree in International Management. He comes from Bangladesh, but because of a fully-funded scholarship he received from the university, he was able to move to Poland.

When he’s not at work, he enjoys cooking and good food. He’s also very keen on aeroplanes and aviation.

Albert Konik

Senior Content Writer

albert@susodigital.com

Albert creates exceptional content for SUSO’s Clients, and his favourite niches to write about are finance, marketing, sports, sports betting, as well as travel and CBD-related topics. Albert has a master’s degree in Economics and in his work life, values on-time delivery, precision, and any opportunity to expand his knowledge of SEO. Privately, Albert is a proud owner of his dog Pablo, The Office fanatic, an enthusiast of LEGO, Star Wars, and Marvel, as well as an Arsenal fan.

Johanan Viljoen

Senior Content Writer

johanan.viljoen@susodigital.com

Johanan creates stellar content for SUSO’s clients all the way from a small farm in Bela-Bela, South Africa. Johanan brings his valuable experience in content creation – he worked in the profession for five years, starting out as a column journalist. He has diplomas in English language, English literature, and English grammar, TEFL certification, and a deep love for classical music, literature, and poetry.

Privately, Johanan raises pigs, chickens, ducks, and geese on his farm, grows around 50-75% of his own veggies, and enjoys spending his time playing the recorder and glockenspiel/xylophone (he plans to learn the bass guitar soon).

Maciej Grzymkowski

Senior Content Writer

maciej@susodigital.com

Maciej joined SUSO in May of 2020 and since then he’s been creating unique content for clients from diverse industries. He has a degree in International Relations from the University of Warsaw and is currently a student of International Public Administration at Roskilde University in Denmark.

 

Maciej started his journey as a content creator by freelancing, which allowed him to gain valuable experience. He’s great under pressure and loves a good challenge. In his free time, he enjoys football (he’s a massive Manchester United fan) and playing games.

Matty Bates

Senior Content Writer

matthew.bates@susodigital.com

Matthew is a part of SUSO’s Content Team, helping our Clients convey their messages into words people want to read. He is based in Thailand, where he spent the last 19 years. 

Matthew’s work experience is versatile. At the age of fifteen, he left school, and in most of his early twenties, he worked in sales. 

After that, he gained an interest in marketing and managed to create and run a successful niche advertising business for ten years before declaring himself a content writer in 2020. After work hours, Matthew likes to ride classic Lambretta scooters and pursue his latest passion – horology. 

Steve Cooper

Senior Content Writer

steve@susodigital.com

Steve is a Senior Writer who creates superb content for SUSO’s Clients from various industries. Part of his job is also editing. Originally from London, he now lives in Chiang Mai, Thailand and is a father of two, martial arts enthusiast, avid reader, and traveller when he gets the chance.

 

Steve’s work experience is extremely varied – he used to work as a postman, legal archivist, cafe owner, and book importer, to name a few. He has been part of the Content Team at SUSO since 2019 and continues to appreciate the challenge of writing whilst always striving to improve his skills.

Agata Wasilewska

Content Writer

agata.wasilewska@susodigital.com

Agata is part of SUSO’s Content Team, which makes her responsible for writing copy for the clients. Before joining the company, she studied English and Media in the UK.

 

Outside of work, Agata spends her free time cooking vegan food, reading, and doing yoga. In the near future, she wishes to learn two new languages – Spanish and French, and one of her biggest dreams is to go on a yoga retreat in Bali.

Anastasiia Tatuiko

Content Writer

anastasiia.tatuiko@susodigital.com

Anastasiia is a member of SUSO’s Content Team, meaning one of her primary responsibilities is writing content for a wide range of clients. She comes from Vinnytsia, Ukraine, and together with her friend, has organised a meeting club for children and teenagers arriving from Ukraine to help them find friends and make them feel less lonely in a new environment.

 

She speaks an amazing number of languages, such as Ukrainian, Polish, English, and Turkish. Her other interests include books, games, and music.

Anne Murigi

Content Writer

anne.murigi@susodigital.com

Anne is a Content Writer with over 13 years of experience in copywriting and 3 years of experience in SEO. She also has over two years of experience in social media management. 

 

Anne graduated from St. Paul’s University with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, with a major in Software Engineering. When she’s not working, she enjoys reading, cooking and writing.

Oliwia Zawadzka

Content Writer

oliwia@susodigital.com

At SUSO, Oliwia is responsible for creating awesome content for clients of all kinds. She loves to write about travel, translations, languages, and law.

 

Oliwia graduated from Wyższa Szkoła Bankowa in Poznan, where she studied English Philology with a specialisation in English Business Communication. Her favourite things to do outside work include reading, travelling, and learning new languages (she currently speaks Polish, English, Italian, and Spanish).

Paulina Dolatowska

Mid Content Writer

paulina@susodigital.com

Paulina works as a Content Writer and Scheduling Manager at SUSO. Her responsibilities include writing and optimising content for our diverse client base as well as scheduling the work of writers in the Content Team. She graduated from Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznan with a degree in English Philology.

 

Paulina has been working as an SEO content writer since 2015 and also has experience working in a video games marketing company. She highly values self-development and in her work, she is organised, detail-oriented, and bold. Her biggest passions in life are video games, cinema, singing, Bollywood dance, and LGBTQ+ activism.

Paulina Piaskowska

Content Writer

paulina.piaskowska@susodigital.com

Although at SUSO she’s met with a variety of topics, Paulina’s favourites to write about are literature, entertainment, real estate, home decor, and travel. Paulina graduated from Uniwersytet Gdański, where she studied Polish Philology. SUSO isn’t her first writing job, bringing with her a few years of experience as a copywriter.

 

Paulina values a good work-life balance and in her free time enjoys literature, music, writing, bike-riding, and swimming. She’s also interested in all things space.

Artur Karpinski

Senior Account Manager

artur.karpinski@susodigital.com

Artur manages a variety of projects to support SUSO’s Clients in every stage of their journey to success. He graduated from Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznan with a degree in English Studies. Artur is a founder of Browar Golem and writes content for his website, beerbaconliberty.com.

 

Before Artur embarked on his entrepreneurial journey, he worked as an English teacher and a radio host. At work and in life, he values assertiveness, ambition, and self-development. His biggest passions include craft beer, cooking, traveling, rock and roll, the concept of American individualism, and related cultural memes.

Konrad Olszewski

Senior Account Manager

konrad@susodigital.com

Konrad’s position at SUSO is Account Manager – his responsibilities include being the point of contact between clients and the rest of the SUSO teams. He moved to Ireland at the age of 11, where he graduated from college with a 1st Class B. A (Hons) in Business & Management.

 

Before joining SUSO, he served in the reserve defence forces, trained in martial arts, and launched two companies in the field of e-commerce eco-products and immersive media production services. His interests include technology, the universe, stoicism, entrepreneurship, and SEO.

Pawel Jarzyniewski

Senior Account Manager

pawel.jarzyniewski@susodigital.com

Paweł’s role at SUSO entails helping clients receive top-notch campaigns specifically designed to meet their SEO needs. He came to SUSO with over 6 years of experience in digital and SEO projects, as well as three years of experience in managing Customer Service teams in leading SEO companies. He also has a degree in Marketing and Management from Bydgoszcz University of Science and Technology.

When he’s not working, he spends time with his daughter. He really enjoys running, mainly participating in half-marathons, as well as reading, with his favourite author being Stephen King. He used to be the owner of an antiquarian bookstore, and he also plays instruments – specifically, ukulele, drums and the trumpet.

Alla Pekar

Mid Account Manager

alla.pekar@susodigital.com

Alla is one of SUSO’s Account Managers. Prior to joining SUSO, she already had a few years of experience in link building and project management.

 

Alla graduated from Belarusian State University from the Faculty of International Relations with a Bachelor’s degree in International Economics. In her free time, she enjoys sports and dancing – and was even a cheerleader for a hockey club.

Gracjan Jamroszczyk

Mid Account Manager

gracjan.jamroszczyk@susodigital.com

As an Account Manager, Gracjan works directly with SUSO’s clients – offering them support, professionalism, and commitment to their projects. Gracjan graduated from Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznan, where he got his Journalism and Political Sciences degrees. He has worked as a copywriter, editor, and marketing specialist, but his friendly, outgoing nature helped him realise he’s most satisfied when working with people.

 

In his free time, Gracjan is a fan of video games and loves doing all kinds of sports including CrossFit, squash, cycling, and hiking.

Izabela Rekowska

Mid Account Manager

iza.rekowska@susodigital.com

Izabela is an Account Manager at SUSO, helping clients reach their goals from the get-go. She’s been involved in the marketing industry for over a decade, which impacted her ability to approach her clients with professionalism and dedication.

 

Iza graduated from the University of Economics in Poznan and ESCP Business School with degrees in Marketing and Commerce as well as Business & Management with a specialisation in Marketing. After hours, she’s part of a punk/indie rock band. She enjoys singing, writing lyrics and, from time to time, playing guitar.

Robert Kujawa

Mid Account Manager

robert.kujawa@susodigital.com

Robert joined the company in 2022 as a member of SUSO’s Projects team. His main responsibilities include managing Clients’ projects and providing the best technical solutions tailored to their needs. Robert gained valuable experience working in the position of Account Manager in major Polish marketing agencies, where he handled key and corporate Clients. 

He’s a Poznan University of Economics graduate and a big enthusiast of AI, automatization, and optimization of workplace processes. In his private life, Robert is passionate about portrait photography and road biking.

Oleksandra Bondar

Account Manager

oleksandra.bondar@susodigital.com

Oleksandra is an Account Manager at SUSO. Before joining the company, she gained experience in sales, event management, and B2B relation management. As for her education, she holds two Master’s degrees – in Business Communication and in Media Communication, and is currently studying Fashion Patternmaking.

When she’s not at work, she enjoys spending time in quiet places like the forest or parks. She also enjoys music, which is why she worked as a venue guide for one of the biggest music festivals in Ukraine for four years.

Hetvi Thakker

Account Manager Intern

hetvi.thakker@susodigital.com

Hetvi joined SUSO in 2023, bringing her enthusiasm and positive energy to our Account Manager Team. Currently a second-year student pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration and Management at The Poznań University of Economics and Business, Hetvi showcases her dedication to both education and her professional endeavours.

With prior experience in the retail industry, Hetvi has gained valuable insights into the inner workings of businesses and the factors that drive their operations. This practical experience has given her a unique advantage in understanding both client needs and company perspectives. In her role, Hetvi excels at being detail-oriented and ensuring that everything runs smoothly, striving for perfection in her work.

When she’s not killing it at work, Hetvi is passionate about trying out new recipes, swimming, and reading.
